text: Pecluma is a genus of ferns in the family Polypodiaceae, subfamily Polypodioideae, according to the Pteridophyte Phylogeny Group classification of 2016 (PPG I). They are called rockcap ferns. == Species == , Checklist of Ferns and Lycophytes of the World accepted the following species: *Pecluma absidata (A.M.Evans) M.G.Price *Pecluma alfredii (Rosenst.)
